topics.body:
I was so busy getting my clearance checked, I forgot it was my birthday yesterday.

Too tired from the night before, woke up around noon. Walk into kitchen, see mother, brother and Ivy cooking some stuff. I ask what's the occasion. Probably the biggest laugh they ever had and one of the more embarrassing moments of mine.

topics.body: Well china just put it's fucking foot in it's mouth.  If you're wondering what happened Hong Kong's leader just outright said why they are against democracy and said that he's against democracy because he believes it gives the poor too much power and believes the wealthy should only have power.  Congratulations communist party, you just unintentionally alienated over half of your population.  Good luck trying to stop the protests now.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5447ee206368724d218b0100#post_5447ee206368724d218b0100
Democracy is just scaled back Communism anyway.
Think about it: assumes all resources arencommunally owned and that a majority can vote where they go (transfer payments, budget goals of politicians etc)
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5447f66163687262868b0100#post_5447f66163687262868b0100
Mainland China is a terrible place to live and I can understand why people are tired of communism there cause the Chinese communist party keeps claiming that it's for the best of the nation, but in reality if they continue to be communist I doubt their rapid economic growth is going to sustain itself for another decade or so.  Speaking of which I think their economic growth is starting to slow down.

topics.body:
[spoiler]!img.bato.to/comics/2011/12/15/k/read4eea2bf65430c/img000005.png!
This is Gash. He is currently having a nervous breakdown at a moral conundrum. He may have to sacrifice the lives of one of his friends to protect the world. Gash, of course, WANTS to save Lee Yen but saving her means the destruction of the world. A similar situation came up in Naruto, when blondie began  hyper-ventilating at the thought that he MIGHT have to kill Sasuke. The difference this scene was handeled COMPETENTLY. I actually care about what happens to Lee Yen but I also care about the other characters and can understand Gash's confliction.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
